Description: The 112 Riposte is a small VLS-launched missile with the primary function of intercepting incoming missile threats. When in range, the Riposte detonates, launching fragmentation at the incoming threat to destroy it. The Riposte is completely ineffective against warships. Size: 1 Cruise Speed: 300 m/s Range: 4,500 m Warhead: Type: Blast Fragmentation Damage: 50 Blast Radius: 25 Seeker: Type: Command Guided Supports TRPs: No
